languages.text: "Спасибо, Лорд-капитан". {n}Идира выдыхает слова едва слышно. На ее лице явственно читается облегчение.{/n} "Уж на что Футфол был грязным местом... только кровью и слезами эту грязь не смыть — только сделать еще смраднее".

"Thank you, Lord Captain." {n}Idira's words are barely audible, breathed out rather than spoken. Her expression is clearly one of relief.{/n} "As filthy of a place as Footfall is... blood and tears won't wash away that filth — they'll only make the stench worse."
languages.original_text: "Спасибо, Лорд-капитан". {n}Идира выдыхает слова едва слышно. На ее лице явственно читается облегчение.{/n} "Уж на что Футфол был грязным местом... только кровью и слезами эту грязь не смыть — только сделать еще смраднее".

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain." {n}Idira's words are barely audible, breathed out rather than spoken. Her expression is clearly one of relief.{/n} "As filthy of a place as Footfall is... blood and tears won't wash away that filth — they'll only make the stench worse."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain." {n}Idira's words are barely audible, breathed out rather than spoken. Her expression is clearly one of relief.{/n} "As filthy of a place as Footfall is... blood and tears won't wash away that filth — they'll only make the stench worse."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “谢谢你，舰长大人。”{n}伊迪拉以几乎听不到的声音开了口，听起来更像是呼了口气，她看起来如释重负。{/n}“落脚港确实是个肮脏的地方……但鲜血与眼泪无法洗去污秽，只会让这里变得更加恶臭难闻。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain." {n}Idira's words are barely audible, breathed out rather than spoken. Her expression is clearly one of relief.{/n} "As filthy of a place as Footfall is... blood and tears won't wash away that filth — they'll only make the stench worse."

traits.locale_text: “谢谢你，舰长大人。”{n}伊迪拉以几乎听不到的声音开了口，听起来更像是呼了口气，她看起来如释重负。{/n}“落脚港确实是个肮脏的地方……但鲜血与眼泪无法洗去污秽，只会让这里变得更加恶臭难闻。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「ありがとう。ロード・キャプテン」{n}かろうじてイディラの言葉を聞き取ることができた。喋るというより、息を吐いたようなかすかな音で、その顔には安堵の表情を浮かべていた。{/n}「フットフォールは不潔な場所だったわ…血や涙は、汚れを洗い流す事は出来ない…悪臭をより一層、強めるだけで」
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain." {n}Idira's words are barely audible, breathed out rather than spoken. Her expression is clearly one of relief.{/n} "As filthy of a place as Footfall is... blood and tears won't wash away that filth — they'll only make the stench worse."

traits.locale_text: 「ありがとう。ロード・キャプテン」{n}かろうじてイディラの言葉を聞き取ることができた。喋るというより、息を吐いたようなかすかな音で、その顔には安堵の表情を浮かべていた。{/n}「フットフォールは不潔な場所だったわ…血や涙は、汚れを洗い流す事は出来ない…悪臭をより一層、強めるだけで」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Gracias, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}». {n}Las palabras de Idira apenas se oyen. Su expresión es de claro alivio.{/n} «Por sucio que sea Paso... la sangre y las lágrimas no serán capaces de limpiar tanta inmundicia, solo empeorarán el hedor».
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain." {n}Idira's words are barely audible, breathed out rather than spoken. Her expression is clearly one of relief.{/n} "As filthy of a place as Footfall is... blood and tears won't wash away that filth — they'll only make the stench worse."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}». {n}Las palabras de Idira apenas se oyen. Su expresión es de claro alivio.{/n} «Siendo Paso un lugar tan sucio... la sangre y las lágrimas no serían capaces de limpiar tanta inmundicia, solo empeorarían el hedor».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Danke, Lord Captain." {n}Idiras Worte sind kaum hörbar, eher gehaucht denn gesprochen. Die pure Erleichterung steht Ihr ins Gesicht geschrieben.{/n} "So widerwärtig Footfall auch ist ... Blut und Tränen werden diesen Schmutz nicht wegwaschen, sie werden den Gestank nur noch schlimmer machen."
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain." {n}Idira's words are barely audible, breathed out rather than spoken. Her expression is clearly one of relief.{/n} "As filthy of a place as Footfall is... blood and tears won't wash away that filth — they'll only make the stench worse."

traits.locale_text: "Danke, Lord Captain." {n}Idiras Worte sind kaum hörbar, eher gehaucht denn gesprochen. Die pure Erleichterung steht Ihr ins Gesicht geschrieben.{/n} "So widerwärtig Footfall auch war ... Blut und Tränen könnten diesen Schmutz nicht wegwaschen, sie würden den Gestank nur noch schlimmer machen."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Merci, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}dit Idira dans un murmure à peine audible. Le soulagement se lit sur son visage.{/n} « Castel est peut-être un endroit malpropre... mais ce n'est pas dans le sang et les larmes qu'on laverait cette crasse. Ils ne feraient que rendre la puanteur pire encore. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain." {n}Idira's words are barely audible, breathed out rather than spoken. Her expression is clearly one of relief.{/n} "As filthy of a place as Footfall is... blood and tears won't wash away that filth — they'll only make the stench worse."

traits.locale_text: « Merci, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, » {n}dit Idira dans un murmure à peine audible. Le soulagement se lit sur son visage.{/n} « Castel est peut-être un endroit malpropre... mais ce n'est pas dans le sang et les larmes qu'on laverait cette crasse. Ils ne feraient que rendre la puanteur pire encore. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Müteşekkirim Lord Kaptan." {n}İdira'nın sözleri zorlukla duyuluyor. Konuşmuyor, fısıldıyor âdeta. Yüzündeki ifadeden rahatladığı açıkça anlaşılıyor.{/n} "Binliman pislikten geçilmiyor ama... Bu pisliği kan ve gözyaşıyla yıkayamayız. Kokusu çıkmaz."
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain." {n}Idira's words are barely audible, breathed out rather than spoken. Her expression is clearly one of relief.{/n} "As filthy of a place as Footfall is... blood and tears won't wash away that filth — they'll only make the stench worse."

traits.locale_text: "Müteşekkirim Lord Kaptan." {n}İdira'nın sözleri zorlukla duyuluyor. Konuşmuyor, fısıldıyor âdeta. Yüzündeki ifadeden rahatladığı açıkça anlaşılıyor.{/n} "Binliman pislikten geçilmiyor ama... bu pisliği kan ve gözyaşıyla yıkayamayız. Kokusu çıkmaz."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
